FuncDef: This command specifies which pre-shared-key is the active transmitting pre-shared-key. If there are two pre-shared-keys configured, the arriving MACsec MKA can be decrypted via CAKs of both pre-shared keys; however, only the active-psk will be used for TX encryption of MKA PDUs.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the value of the pre-shared-key. Values-1 or 2.
